name: Band Managment Tools
author: DX2 Systems

sections.description: This plugin will add all of the custom post information in order to create pages that can be used with the DX2 Band Theme. The custom fields will not be displayed for pages unless the theme supports it.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Once installed you will need to then activate the DX2 Band theme in order to make proper use of this plugin.

short_description: Addon plugin to work with the DX2 Band theme.
description: This plugin will add all of the custom post information in order to create pages that can be used with the DX2 Band Theme. The custom fields will not be displayed for pages unless the theme supports it.
